https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pLiaYElcJ8l20cgFEGyaV8oMACk.jpg Ben Folds is at his best on stage with only a grand piano for company. He is a compelling showman who's blessed with an unforced charm that complements the anger and melancholy that informs most of his songs. Ben Folds Live
